de.cocolab.reuse
Class Ident

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--de.cocolab.reuse.Ident
public class Ident
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A string interpreted as an Identifier. Instances of this class are obtained from IdentTable. Within the scope of a particular IdentTable object, if two strings are equal they will be represented by the same Ident instance. Thus, equality may be tested with the == opertor rather than the less efficient equals.

For the implementation of efficient symbol tables, each Ident instance has an integer value (or code) which may be used as an array index.

Version:
$Id: $
See Also:
IdentTable, Serialized Form
